studyMetadata.title: Visualization Study
studyMetadata.description: A study to test the empirical effectiveness of truncating the y-axis of bar charts.

config.title: Average Monthly Temperatures for Country S

response.prompt: Select the option that orders the months from highest to lowest average temperature.
options: Jul, Jun, Sep, Aug, May, Apr, Oct, Feb, Nov, Mar, Jan, Dec
Mar, Dec, Jan, Jul, May, Jun, Feb, Aug, Nov, Apr, Sep, Oct
Jul, Oct, Jan, May, Sep, Feb, Jun, Apr, Dec, Mar, Nov, Aug
Dec, Jan, Mar, Nov, Feb, Oct, Apr, May, Aug, Sep, Jun, Jul

correctAnswer.answer: Jul, Jun, Sep, Aug, May, Apr, Oct, Feb, Nov, Mar, Jan, Dec

config.title: Average Monthly Temperatures for Country S

response.prompt: Select the option that orders the months from highest to lowest average temperature.

correctAnswer.answer: Jul, Jun, Sep, Aug, May, Apr, Oct, Feb, Nov, Mar, Jan, Dec
